3module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run

9
10import qualified System.Environment     as Env
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base   as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data   as D
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core   as C
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer as W
15
16
17
18-- ----------------------
19
20-- | Read and union sections from files, and run the section.
21runFiles :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> [B.IOPoint] -> IO B.ExitCode
22runFiles g ns =
23    do (abRes, _) <- C.resRead g ns
24       case abRes of
25         Left a    -> C.globalAbort g a
26         Right res -> case C.resRun res of
27                        Left a   -> C.globalAbort g a
28                        Right r  -> C.putResult r
29
30getProxies :: IO [(String, Maybe String)]
31getProxies =
32    do httpProxy   <- Env.lookupEnv "http_proxy"
33       httpsProxy  <- Env.lookupEnv "https_proxy"
34       ftpProxy    <- Env.lookupEnv "ftp_proxy"
35       return [ ("http"  , httpProxy)
36              , ("https" , httpsProxy)
37              , ("ftp"   , ftpProxy) ]
38
